content: the perfect 1 ball hat to keep you cozy in the chilly weather wear as a fashionable touque with the brim up or as a ear-warming hat with the brim down stay warm **materials needed ** 5 0mm and 6 0mm 16 circular needles *or* 40 circular needles 6 0mm dpns stitch marker s darning needle **skills needed ** knitting purling knitting two together **difficulty ** 1/5 - very easy
